title.rendered: How to Change the Ringtone on Your iPhone 6S

content.rendered:
The iPhone 6s is considered to be one of the better models which were released at the time, and it still holds up very well today. Being packed full of patented Apple technology, it’s safe to assume that this is going to maintain its functionality for many years to come.

One of the biggest appeals of an Apple device is the fact that you can customise it to suit your desires. Nearly every part of the iPhone can be changed and personalised, and the ringtone is no different. We are going to be looking at how you change the tone on your iPhone 6s.

Changing Your Tune

Thankfully, the process to change the ringtone on your iPhone 6s is not tricky. Like most of the features and functionality of the phone, it is easy to use because that’s what Apple intended.

The first thing that you’re going to want to do is make sure that you’re signed into the iTunes Store. You can do this by using the Apple ID which you had to create when you first got the phone, or you can use an existing one. 

There are a couple of different ways that you can search for ringtone and text tones to use on your device. You can search by particular franchises, you can go by keywords, or you can narrow down the parameters to only show ringtones only. 

Once you have browsed the selection of ringtone is available, you’re going to want to move ahead to the payment process. Thankfully, this is not difficult, as only a credit card, debit card or gift voucher is needed to pay for your new ringtone. The choices that you have are limited to what can be downloaded from the iTunes Store, so it’s worth checking out all the options.  

It may come as something of a shock to people to learn that that’s all you need to do. On the payment screen, you will be prompted to either assign the ringtone to a contact, or to set it as the default for when an incoming call is made. It’s entirely up to you. At any point, you can go back into your settings or your Contacts app to change the ringtone and assign it to a different contact if you want to.

It is not a convenience that Apple made changing the ringtone of the phone such a simple task. There are so many different available options, so it’s not difficult to imagine that anyone can find a new ringtone with ease for their needs. All that you need to make sure that you have available to you is an internet connection. This is critical for all that you want to do with the phone because downloading any new ringtone requires you to go online. However, people who have taken the time to do that will find that they have numerous options available to them.
